__e: I knew our son couldn't do those things.
Does it have to do with the fact that Gideon didn't choose you?
Gideon hasn't shown up. And don't tell me you quit or I put in for a transfer.
Stay close with Gideon and do whatever he says to you.
You had no reason to harm Gideon, and you knew what I'd do to your family if you betrayed me.
You. Just you, because whoever killed Gideon, he's out there.
After everything Gideon had done for us, I was scared to tell him.
Gideon has the strength to shoot a few rounds into the door.
